title: (x) Raglan Road logo unicase serif face - FF Disturbance {Akira}
content:
I’ve searched for this on these forums, and tried WTF, but no luck. Any idea what the typeface is in “Raglan Road”?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006023856im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/RaglanRoad_3895.png)

 [‹ Carol Brand logo slab serif](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006023856/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38158 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) The New York Times Magazine fonts - Cheltenham, Stymie, Memphis, Stempel Garamond {Florian, Jan E} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081006023856/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38152 "Go to next forum topic")
author: BradB

comments.content: Thank you so much! I \_knew\_ it started with a D... ;-)
